entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: NE 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy except snow at times heavy inland and over higher terrain late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm except snowfall amount 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Snow at times heavy inland and over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
